response.overview: What happens when a nineteen year old boy heads into the jungles to make contact and Christianise a murderous, stone-age tribe of Motilone Indians? The adventures of Bruce Olson as he revolutionises the world of missions and learns that the Christian life is never an easy one.
response.tagline: The adventures of Bruce Olson as he sets out to Christianize the tribe of Motilone Indians in South America.
response.title: Bruchko
